name: RTCDTMFSender.ontonechange
description: The ontonechange property of the RTCDTMFSender interface is used to set the event handler for the tonechange event, which is sent to the RTCDTMFSender each time a tone begins or ends. The event handler receives as input a single parameter of type RTCDTMFToneChangeEvent, which describes the change.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'ontonechange' in WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers.
